mapper.select: select c.store_name, b.menu_name, a.order_cnt, sum(a.order_cnt*b.menu_price), substr(a.in_date,1,8), a.in_user_id, a.pay_flag from order_info a, menu b, store_info c where a.menu_seq=b.menu_seq and b.store_seq= c.store_seq and a.in_user_id=:1 group by c.store_name,b.menu_name,a.order_cnt,substr(a.in_date,1,8),a.in_user_id, a.pay_flag order by 5 desc
select distinct menu_seq from (select menu_seq from order_info where in_user_id = :1 order by in_date desc) where rownum<=9
select menu_seq from (select menu_seq from order_info where in_user_id = :1 order by in_date desc) where rownum<=9

select order_seq, pay_flag, m.menu_seq, store_seq, o.in_date, u.room_seq from menu m right outer join order_info o on(m.menu_seq = o.menu_seq) left outer join user_info u on(u.user_id = o.in_user_id)
where substr(o.in_date,1,8) = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') and u.room_seq = :1 and m.store_seq = :2
select menu_seq from ( select menu_seq, in_date from recom where user_id=:1 order by in_date desc ) where rownum = 1

select m.store_seq, i.room_seq, m.menu_name, nvl(sum(o.order_cnt),0) order_cnt, nvl(sum(o.order_cnt*m.menu_price),0) order_sum from order_info o, menu m, user_info i where o.menu_seq = m.menu_seq and o.in_user_id = i.in_user_id and m.store_seq='1' and i.room_seq='401' and substr(o.in_date,1,8)=to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') and o.pay_flag='n' group by m.store_seq,i.room_seq,m.menu_name
mapper.update: insert into starget ( survey_id, st_mobile, complete_yn, in_date, in_user_id, up_date, up_user_id ) values ( :1, :2, :3, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD.HH24MISS'), :4, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD.HH24MISS'), :5 )
update starget set complete_yn =:1, up_date = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD.HH24MISS'), up_user_id =:2 where survey_id=:3 and st_mobile=:4

update ( select order_seq, pay_flag, m.menu_seq, store_seq, o.in_date, u.room_seq from menu m right outer join order_info o on(m.menu_seq = o.menu_seq) left outer join user_info u on(u.user_id = o.in_user_id)
where substr(o.in_date,1,8) = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') and u.room_seq = :1) set pay_flag='y' where store_seq=:2
delete from starget where survey_id = :3 and st_mobile= :4
mapper.select: select rr.room_seq as room, nvl(tbl.cnt,0) as cnt, nvl(tbl.in_date, (select to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') from dual)) as indate from room rr left outer join (select r.room_seq as room , nvl(sum(o.order_cnt),0) as cnt, m.store_seq as storeseq, substr(o.in_date,1,8) as in_date from user_info u inner join order_info o on (u.in_user_id = o.in_user_id and substr(o.in_date,1,8) = (select to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') from dual)) right outer join room r on u.room_seq = r.room_seq left outer join menu m on o.menu_seq = m.menu_seq where m.store_seq =:0 group by r.room_seq, m.store_seq, substr(o.in_date,1,8) order by 1) tbl on rr.room_seq = tbl.room where rr.del_flag = 'n' order by 1

select substr(order_info.in_date,1,4)||'-'||substr(order_info.in_date,5,2)||'-'||substr(order_info.in_date,7,2) as in_date, user_info.user_name, user_info.user_id, store_name, menu_name, order_info.order_cnt * menu.menu_price as sum from user_info inner join order_info on user_info.user_id = order_info.in_user_id inner join menu using(menu_seq) inner join store_info using(store_seq) where :v_user_id is null or user_info.user_id = :v_user_id order by ORDER_INFO.IN_DATE desc

select substr(order_info.in_date,1,4)||'-'||substr(order_info.in_date,5,2)||'-'||substr(order_info.in_date,7,2) as in_date, user_info.user_name, user_info.user_id, store_name, menu_name, order_info.order_cnt * menu.menu_price as sum from user_info inner join order_info on user_info.user_id = order_info.in_user_id inner join menu using(menu_seq) inner join store_info using(store_seq) where :v_user_name is null or user_info.user_name like '%'||:v_user_name||'%' order by ORDER_INFO.IN_DATE desc

SELECT substr(ORDER_INFO.IN_DATE,1,4)||'-'||substr(ORDER_INFO.IN_DATE,5,2)||'-'||substr(ORDER_INFO.IN_DATE,7,2) as in_date, USER_INFO.USER_NAME, USER_INFO.USER_ID, STORE_NAME, MENU_NAME, ORDER_INFO.order_cnt * MENU.menu_price AS SUM FROM USER_INFO INNER JOIN ORDER_INFO ON USER_INFO.USER_ID = ORDER_INFO.IN_USER_ID INNER JOIN MENU USING(MENU_SEQ) INNER JOIN STORE_INFO USING(STORE_SEQ) WHERE :V_IN_DATE is null or SUBSTR(ORDER_INFO.IN_DATE,1,8) = SUBSTR(:V_IN_DATE,1,8) order by ORDER_INFO.IN_DATE desc
select store_seq from store_info where del_flag = 'n' order by store_seq
select store_name, store_seq from store_info where del_flag = 'n' order by store_seq

select s.store_seq,s.store_name,m.menu_name, m.menu_price, sum(o.order_cnt),c.store_code, m.menu_seq, u.room_seq,substr(o.in_date,1,8) from order_info o inner join user_info u on (o.in_user_id = u.user_id and u.room_seq = ( select room_seq from user_info where in_user_id = :1 ) and substr(o.in_date,1,8) = (select to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') from dual) ) left outer join menu m on (o.menu_seq = m.menu_seq) left outer join store_info s on (s.store_seq = m.store_seq) left outer join store_code c on ( s.store_seq = c.store_seq) where s.store_seq = :2 group by s.store_seq,s.store_name, m.menu_name, m.menu_price,c.store_code,m.menu_seq,u.room_seq,substr(o.in_date,1,8)

select m.store_seq, i.room_seq, m.menu_name, s.store_tel, nvl(sum(o.order_cnt),0) order_cnt, nvl(sum(o.order_cnt*m.menu_price),0) order_sum from order_info o, menu m, user_info i,store_info s where o.menu_seq = m.menu_seq and o.in_user_id = i.in_user_id and m.store_seq = s.store_seq and m.store_seq=:1 and i.room_seq=:2 and substr(o.in_date,1,8)=to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') and o.pay_flag='n' group by m.store_seq,i.room_seq,m.menu_name,s.store_tel
select menu_name, menu_price, menu_seq from menu where store_seq =:1

select tbl.mname, tbl.sum, (select store_name from store_info where store_seq = sseq) as sname, rownum from (select sum(order_cnt) as sum, menu_seq as mseq, menu_name as mname, store_seq as sseq from order_info inner join menu using (menu_seq) where menu.store_seq =: 1 group by menu_seq, menu_name, store_seq order by 1 desc) tbl where rownum <=10
select menu_seq, menu_name, menu_price from menu where store_seq =: 1 and del_flag = 'n'
mapper.update: insert into order_info (order_seq, menu_seq, order_cnt, pay_flag, in_date, in_user_id) values ((SELECT NVL(MAX(order_seq),0)+1 FROM order_info), :1, :2, 'n', to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD.HH24MISS'), :3)
mapper.select: select tt.user_id, ( select user_name from user_info uu where uu.user_id = tt.user_id ) user_name from ( select t.user_id from ( select o.menu_seq, o.order_cnt, o.pay_flag, u.user_id, u.ROOM_SEQ, u.user_name from order_info o,user_info u where o.IN_USER_ID = u.user_id and o.MENU_SEQ = :1 and u.ROOM_SEQ = :2 and substr(o.in_date,1,8) = :3 ) t group by t.user_id ) tt
